entities.name: madam bones
entities.description: Madam Bones is described as looking down at Mrs. Figg in silence. She is also mentioned to have a booming voice.

entities.name: mrs figg
entities.description: Mrs. Figg is described as being frightened and casting a look from Fudge to Dumbledore. She is also mentioned to be a witness.

entities.name: fudge
entities.description: Fudge is described as not looking at Madam Bones, fidgeting with his papers, and being aggressive in his questioning of Mrs. Figg.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned to be the one that Mrs. Figg casts a frightened look at.

entities.name: dementors
entities.description: Dementors are described as being able to attack and cause effects on people.

relationships.description: Madam Bones looked down at Mrs. Figg in silence.
Mrs. Figg casts a frightened look from Fudge to Dumbledore.
Fudge questioned Mrs. Figg, and Madam Bones defended her.
